subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Alexander Noren of Sweden shared a one-stroke lead at the British Masters with Lee Westwood after finishing with a six-under-par 66 when the fog-delayed second round was completed at the Belfry. ¶Lorena Ochoa, who has not won a tournament since May, shot a three-under 69 and shared the lead with Louise Friberg after three rounds of the Navistar L.P.G.A. Classic in Prattville, Ala. lpga ¶Bruce Fleisher shot a six-under 66 to take a one-stroke lead into the final round of the SAS Championship in Cary, N.C. champions.
